quote: "It was such a privilege to be a part of such an incredible and meaningful experience.  Witnessing how it touched the kids' hearts was magical."
author: Firefly

quote: "Camp Kesem has some of the most amazing, compassionate, honest people I have ever known and I am so thankful they made me apart of everyone of these children's journey for life."
author: Hello Kitty

quote: "I wish I could stay at camp forever!"
author: John Cena
